name: The Immortal

physical_specifications.build: Ultra-muscular and athletic — broad shoulders, thick chest, powerful legs; physique of a battle-hardened hero.
physical_specifications.posture: Squared stance, chest forward, head held high; arms relaxed but ready for action.
physical_specifications.body_proportions: Perfectly balanced heroic proportions; long arms and legs with dense muscle mass.

facial_structure.mouth: Medium fullness with neutral heroic set.
facial_structure.skin_texture: Smooth with faint natural lines for realism.

facial_hair.color: Dark brown with lighter brown flecks.

hair.length_cut: Long on top, slicked back; short at sides.

costume.material: Armored compression suit with segmented plating and reinforced textures for durability. Matte-finish base with metallic trim.
costume.primary_color: Deep navy blue (HEX #1B1F3B) — torso, thighs, arms.
costume.secondary_color: Bright golden yellow (HEX #FFD23F) — chest emblem, belt area, shoulder accents, gauntlets, and shin guards.
costume.tertiary_color: Crisp white (HEX #FFFFFF) — cape, gloves, and boot highlights.
costume.cape: Long, flowing white cape with weighted hem for natural drape.
costume.boots: High, armored navy boots with gold knee plating and white accents.
costume.gloves: White, form-fitted gloves with reinforced golden wrist guards.
costume.emblem: Stylized golden symbol across chest, raised slightly with beveled edges.

lighting_behavior: Neutral three-point lighting; soft key, cool fill, faint rim; lock exposure/white balance.

char_spec.movement_gestures: Heroic posture with hands on hips when at rest., Quick, controlled stride with shoulders leading., Points or gestures with open hand when giving orders.

voice_style.reference_line: I’ve seen the rise and fall of empires… and I’m still here.

char_spec.instruction: Ultra-Realistic Character — maintain exact hero-like costume from reference: navy, gold, and white scheme. Ensure tight, athletic fit with high-definition muscle contour and cape flow.

voice_style: Target: Ross Marquand as The Immortal performance — heroic mid baritone; cadence stoic, clipped; ~140 wpm; neutral American; studio-dry, close-mic; no reverb/chorus; no robotic TTS artefacts.
